Reviews.Title: sidekick service ending!!! no more data service!!!
Reviews.Author: J. Nault "gangsta"
Reviews.Content: After May 31, 2011 T-Mobile will be deprecating data service to old sidekicks. You will not be able to browse the web, youtube etc. You can make calls, receive text- but that's it.no I didn't do it. I don't work for them. But i have 2 sidekicks and just got this notice.No more data service for older sidekicks anywhere everywhere no you're not special. sorry.

Reviews.Title: I bought this Tmobile phone and love it - I have AT&T; and it works great.
Reviews.Author: T. Demers "Momtimes4"
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone for my kids. I slipped my ATT sim card in and it seems to work fine...for over a year now.  I don't pay for data for them, but the data still works at all the wifi spots.  For them (they are tweenagers) it works great.  They can load games, songs, etc. It has a micro SD card slot so they can even download things from their laptops to play/view.  I would recomend this phone to someone who is looking for an inexpensive alternative to a smart phone.
